thread.title: Breakfast Lasagna Benedict? New York Chefs Offer Fresh Takes on Classic Egg Dish

author: Charles Passy
title: Breakfast Lasagna Benedict? New York Chefs Offer Fresh Takes on Classic Egg Dish
text:
In New York City, there is a new battle cry among chefs: How bizarre is your Benny?
As in eggs Benedict, the dish that in its traditional form typically features poached eggs and Canadian bacon on two halves of an English muffin, all topped with hollandaise sauceâ€”an elegant hangover cure if ever there was one.
But in recent years, chefs in... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
